entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
